meanings.definition: Relating to the process of excretion or elimination of waste from the body.
meanings.sent1: The egestive process helps the body get rid of waste efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that a healthy diet supports egestive functions.
meanings.sent3: The egestive system works like a well-oiled machine, keeping us healthy.
meanings.sent4: Her egestive habits were as precise as a clock ticking.
meanings.sent5: The importance of egestive health cannot be overstated for overall well-being.

meanings.definition: Causing or involved in the act of expelling waste from the body.
meanings.sent1: The medicine had an egestive effect, helping the patient feel better.
meanings.sent2: The egestive properties of the tea helped cleanse the body naturally.
meanings.sent3: The egestive reaction to the spicy food was unexpected but effective.
meanings.sent4: His egestive response to the situation was swift and necessary.
meanings.sent5: The egestive function of the body is a vital part of maintaining health.
